menu.mods.title: Mods

menu.generator.title: Mod Generator

menu.globalbasicsettings.title: GlobalBasicSettings Editor
menu.globalbasicsettings.tooltip.message: Configure global Roblox settings. You shouldn't change these settings unless you know what you're doing.

menu.integrations.title: Integrations
menu.integrations.mod_updater.title: Automatic Mod Updates
menu.integrations.multi_roblox.title: Multi-Instance Launching
menu.integrations.multi_roblox.description: Run multiple Roblox instances at the same time.
menu.integrations.discord_rpc.title: Discord RPC
menu.integrations.discord_rpc.description: Replace Roblox's default RPC to show more details.
menu.integrations.bloxstrap_rpc.title: BloxstrapRPC SDK
menu.integrations.bloxstrap_rpc.description: Allow games to customize your RPC status using the BloxstrapRPC SDK.
menu.integrations.activity_joining.title: Activity Joining
menu.integrations.activity_joining.description: Allow anyone to join your game through Discord.
menu.integrations.show_user_profile.title: Show profile in RPC
menu.integrations.show_user_profile.description: Show your Roblox avatar in Discord RPC.

menu.settings.title: Settings
menu.settings.appearance.title: Appearance
menu.settings.language.title: Language
menu.settings.check_for_updates.title: Check for updates
menu.settings.confirm_launch.title: Confirm Roblox launch
menu.settings.confirm_launch.description: Ask for confirmation to kill existing Roblox instances.
menu.settings.disable_mods.title: Disable all mods
menu.settings.disable_mods.description: Prevents any mods from being loaded
menu.settings.disable_fastflags.title: Disable FastFlags
menu.settings.disable_fastflags.description: Prevents user-specified FastFlags from being applied.
menu.settings.deployment_info.title: Show deployment info
menu.settings.deployment_info.description: Show information about the current Roblox version when launching Roblox.
menu.settings.force_reinstall.title: Force Roblox reinstallation
menu.settings.force_reinstall.description: Force Roblox to be reinstalled on the next launch.

menu.about.title: About
menu.about.tooltip.title: About {project_name}
menu.about.tooltip.message: {project_name} is an open-source modloader for Roblox, allowing users to manage multiple mods with ease.
